div.h1: Detecting a Small Boat using Histogram PMHT

Tracking on intensity-modulated data streams. NUWC, RI: Technical report 11221, May 2000. Samuel Davey received the Bachelor of Engineering, Master of Mathematical Science, and Ph.D. degrees from the University of Adelaide, Australia, in 1996, 1999, and 2003, respectively. Since 1995 he has worked for the Defence Science and Technology Organi- sation, Australia, in the areas of target tracking, tracker performance assessment, and multi-sensor fusion. He is also a Visiting Research Fellow at the University of Adelaide.
Tracking targets with specified spectra using the H-PMHT algorithm. NUWC, RI: Technical report 11291, June 2001.
